attributes.action: Cancel the laws that allow councils to take property to pay for care/nursing homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is unfair that a person that has worked hard all their lives to buy their own home should be treated differently to a person who has lived their lives on social benefits.
The former has their house taken from them if their health should deteriorate enough for them to need to go into a nursing home whereas the latter who lived on benefits and owns nothing gets to go into a nursing home for free.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Cancel the laws that allow councils to take property to pay for care/nursing homes."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
